resources.string:

Please provide more details below :
You can start this virtual share market from here.\nMarket will run for next 1hr.
Share market will close in next 15 mins
%1$s * %2$s = Rs %3$s/- added to your account.\nKeep going
You don\'t have any share of this company

The Quiz is a means to obtain money to trade with. You can access the Quiz anytime to increase your capital. You can obtain money by answering the questions correctly. You are given Rs 500/- for a correct answer. If you can give the right answers to the questions in an unbroken stretch then you will be awarded that particular question with a multiple of the spree.

For Example: The first correct answer will fetch you Rs 500/-. If you answer the next one correct then you are awarded a sum of 2 * Rs 500/- = Rs 1000/-, for the second question. If you get 3 in a row the third question will contain a value of 3 * Rs 500/- = Rs 1500/- and so on.

If you give a wrong answer the flow is broken and you start from Rs 500/- for each question.

The Market is where you prove your skills as an investor. Utilize the funds you obtained from the Quiz to increase your profits. You can buy and sell shares by clicking on the three dotted options button found next to each stock.

Each session of the Market lasts for one hour after which you’ll need to begin a new session by starting the market again. Maximize your profits to earn the title of \“The Richest Man Alive\” and earn the top spot on the leader board.

Remember if you hit a low on the Market you can always go back to the Quiz to raise some Capital for your future investments.
